gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 129, Jazz 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Jazz, 129-113. Caris LeVert led all scorers with 26 points, seven rebounds and five assists for the Cavaliers, while Jarrett Allen (21 points, 12 rebounds, five assists) and Evan Mobley (21 points, seven rebounds, five assists) added a combined 42 points in the victory. Collin Sexton tallied 19 points and seven assists for the Jazz in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 46-30 on the season, while the Jazz fall to 29-47.
